entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Belleville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:55 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 12:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h late this evening. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
